title: Woodford sacked by his own flagship fund as administrators prepare to wind it up
text:
Neil Woodford has been sacked by his own flagship fund, which will now be wound down, likely marking the final chapter in the career of one of the UK's most fêted fund managers.

The suspended Woodford Equity Income Fund will be closed by its administrator, according to an emailed statement on Tuesday.

Following the decision to wind up the fund, founder Neil Woodford will cease to be the investment manager with immediate effect, according to the fund’s administrator Link Fund Solutions

BlackRock Advisers has been hired to prepare the portfolio for the winding down process.

“After careful review of the fund and its holdings we have decided not to re-open the fund and instead to wind it up,” Link...
description: Neil Woodford has been sacked by his own flagship fund, which will now be wound down, likely marking the final chapter in the career of one of the UK's most fêted fund managers.
